content: Merci chere, je suis tres heureuse pour vous. One of my greatest loves — stretching myself in nature—is a cluster of yours. This includes going into nature’s unknown, letting go of my perceived self-limitations, taking calculated risks, trusting/learning from/sharing with/teaching friends, surviving/thriving, celebrating life… This haiku was from winter camping in the Great White North last weekend. dusk light, then campfire snow reflections help pitch tents midst deep, still forest
